scripts.dev: env-cmd -f .env concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=web" "npm run dev --workspace=api" --kill-others --names "WEB,API" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@repo/database && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.postinstall: env-cmd -f .env npm run generate --workspace=@repo/database || npm run generate --workspace=@repo/database
